mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT A.*, ROWNUM RNUM FROM ( SELECT * FROM V_GOODS ORDER BY 1 DESC) A ) B WHERE RNUM BETWEEN #{go_first} AND #{go_last}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO CART (CART_NO, MEM_ID, GO_NO, CART_QTY) VALUES (CART_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{mem_id}, #{go_no}, #{cart_qty})
mapper.select: SELECT C.*, G.GO_NAME, G.GO_PRICE, C.CART_QTY * G.GO_PRICE AS PTOTAL, M.MEM_NAME, M.MEM_PHONE, M.MEM_EMAIL, M.MEM_ADDRESS, M.MEM_ADDRESS2, M.MEM_ZIPADDRESS FROM CART C JOIN GOODS G ON C.GO_NO = G.GO_NO JOIN MEMBER M ON C.MEM_ID = M.MEM_ID WHERE C.MEM_ID = #{mem_id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO GBUYER (GB_NO, MEM_ID, GB_PAYMENT, GB_TIME, GB_NAME, GB_PHONE, GB_EMAIL, GB_ADDRESS, GB_ADDRESS2, GB_ZIPADDRESS) VALUES (#{gb_no}, #{mem_id}, #{gb_payment}, SYSDATE, #{gb_name}, #{gb_phone}, #{gb_email}, #{gb_address}, #{gb_address2}, #{gb_zipaddress})
INSERT INTO GBUYDETAIL (GBD_NO, GB_NO, GO_NO, CART_QTY) SELECT GBD_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{gb_no}, GO_NO, CART_QTY FROM CART WHERE MEM_ID = #{mem_id}
mapper.select: SELECT GB_NO, MEM_ID, GB_PAYMENT, GB_TIME, GB_NAME, GB_PHONE, GB_EMAIL, GB_ADDRESS, GB_ADDRESS2, GB_ZIPADDRESS FROM GBUYER WHERE MEM_ID = #{mem_id}
